message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I know it's valuable and I'm confident it can greatly benefit you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While $12,000 is still out of my budget, I would like to propose $11,000 as a compromise.
